alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 2:03PM MST until December 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST TUESDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 4500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. * WHERE...New River Mesa, Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare in advance by having extra food, water, blankets, and a cell phone charger in the vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
